title: Data Veracity - Creating an Error Code - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
text: Click on the Manage button in the top navigation bar. Under the Data Management section, click Data Veracity . Then, click on Error Codes to access the page. Next, click on the New Error Code button. Enter your input in the following fields: Open Setting Description Input Requirement Setting Description Input Requirement Error Code Enter the Error Code name to be associated to the UDRs or batches. Note! The Error Code name must be unique and can not be edited after creation. Required Description Enter a description of the error code. Optional Click Apply to create a single error code. To add multiple error codes, click Add Another . This is a quicker way that is equivalent to clicking Apply and then the New Error Code . An error code will be created with the inputs you had entered and the fields in the dialog will reset for your new input. A success message will appear, indicating that the error code has been successfully created. A new row for the newly added error code will appear in the error code table. Open
